mapper.select: select menu.row_id from sm_menu menu where is_show = 1 and (exists (select 1 from sys_user_menu um where um.user_id=#{userId} and um.menu_id=menu.row_id) or exists (select 1 from sm_user_role ur join sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id=rm.role_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and rm.menu_id=menu.row_id))
